reviewText: the movies are not on one disc they are two discs. amazed. love these movies
Two great movies which are perfect for Halloween season. Johnny Depp does not disappoint!

Johnny Depp plays wonderfully in both movies as his knack for his characters employ. Dark shadows places him as a vampire but he wasn't always that way. Good plot with how he got his circumstances. Sleepy Hollow is a realistic view of what might have taken place to get us the Headless Horseman! Buy for one movie and the other is a freebie!
Very great quality, received on time as well.
Two very great movies. Blu-ray is the best way to watch these. Johnny Depp at his finest. A must for Johnny Depp fans.
Great price, I chose no rush delivery and it came within 2 days anyways! Great movies happy customer!

Two great movies packaged together. They are for a gift, making it twice as nice as a single gift.
Love it. 2 in 1 :)

first time I ever saw Dark Shadows with Johnny Depp.  I used to watch the original series with my mom when I was a kid and loved it. I'm a big fan of Johnny Depp but I have to say this wasn't one of my favorites.

Sleepy Hollow is a good movie and Johnny Depp did a great job as Ichabod Crane. I very much like the twist, I have it on VHS but wanted it on DVD.

good video, great price

5 stars for Sleepy Hollow - 3 stars for Dark Shadows. I had hoped for a little more from Dark Shadows. Sleepy Hollow is an atmospheric masterpiece. Dark Shadows falls flat in a lot of areas, though it's not unwatchable. I remember a time when I said Depp doesn't make a bad movie, but I believe he has gotten less picky in recent years. He's earned it (paycheck wise) to do whatever he wants, but it's no longer a guaranteed 5 star film just because he's in it.
I like anything with Johnny Depp so there you are.
Fun cult type movies.

I love love love sleepy hollow, excellent movie, dark shadows was just a bonus, but is good too,  I also bought them because I am soon to own every Tim Burton movie, I have 16 of them now so far, I recommended this set to anyone
